snippet.title: PARAGNOSIA - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Observe every corner of your apartment hour by hour. Find anomalies by moving your camera along the rail that runs through the rooms. Take pictures of anomalies to exorcise the spirits that possess them. Locked in your surveillance room, will you survive the night?

Wishlist PARAGNOSIA on steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3017580/Paragnosia/
